Lavenham Library

Manager: Elise Hardy

Lavenham Village Hall, Church Street, Lavenham
CO10 9QT

Tel: 01787 247729
Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
Friends group: Friends of Lavenham Library

Social media:

  • Facebook

Branch facilities

  • Accessibility information
  • Payments: cash, cheques and cards accepted
  • Parking: large free public car park nearby
  • Out-of-hours book return available
  • Customer toilet

IT and printing facilities

  • Free wifi
  • Book a computer
  • Photocopying: available
  • Colour printing: available
  • Scan to email
  • Printing, photocopying & scanning charges

Opening hours

Day Hours
Monday Closed
Tuesday 1000 – 1300, 1400 – 1700
Wednesday Closed
Thursday 1000 – 1300, 1400 – 1700
Friday 1400 – 1700
Saturday 1000 – 1600
Sunday 1230 – 1600

Regular events and activities

Children's events

Book to Film to Theatre: for 8+ year-olds

Thursday once a month, 1700-1800

Children's reading group incorporating film showings and drama. Contact the library for more information and to book.

Children's craft activities

Sunday, 1400-1500

Lego Club: for 5+ year-olds

Sunday, 1400-1500

Join us for Lego fun and games. What will you make?

Tot Rock

Thursday, 1415-1445

Songs and action rhymes for preschool children, term-time only

Find out more about our Bookstart sessions

Older people's events

Top Time: events and activities for older people

every other Tuesday, 1430-1600

Arts, crafts & games

Crafting Around

Fridays from 8 February, 1430-1600

Bring your own crafts and enjoy refreshments and chatting to others.

Thu 21 Feb, 2019 1415 – 1530

Tue 26 Feb, 2019 1430 – 1600
